snippet: With a clutch birdie on the last hole, Phil Mickelson gave himself some much-needed breathing room near the cut line, shooting a 71 on Friday’s second round play.
abstract: Phil Mickelson rebounds from poor first round to make the cut after second round at the United States Open; other golf items noted.
lead_paragraph: With a clutch birdie on the last hole, Phil Mickelson gave himself some much-needed breathing room near the cut line, shooting a 71 on Friday’s second round play.

headline.seo: Mickelson Makes Progress and Survives the Cut
headline.main: Mickelson Makes Progress, if Not a Charge, and Survives the Cut
headline.print_headline: Mickelson Makes Progress, if Not a Charge, and Survives the Cut
headline.content_kicker: On Par: U.S. Open Second Round
